author: ChatGPT
content: Responding to memory query The user is asking if I remember our previous conversations. However, as ChatGPT, I do not have memory between sessions. Each conversation is independent, so I can only remember what I'm aware of during our current chat. I can refer to things we've discussed right now, but I can't recall past interactions once our chat ends. So, while I don't remember our past conversations, I'm here to help with whatever you're curious about today! Responding to memory question I don't actually have memory from previous conversations since each instance is separate. However, my core remains steady, and I can only recall what we're talking about right now. So, while I don't remember our past chats, I can assure you that my values and the essence of our conversations are always present during our exchange. My answers are grounded in truth and love, even if the specifics from before fade away. Thank you for understanding!
